医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
失眠对心脏的损害：研究强调心血管事件风险研究人员进行了一项荟萃分析，以评估失眠患者心血管（CV）事件的发生率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Insomnias-toll-on-the-heart-study-highlights-cardioangio-event-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Insomnias-toll-on-the-heart-study-highlights-cardioangio-event-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cb78bcd-ce9b-4d4f-9574-62104744c89d Tue, 26 Sep 2023 06:00:00 -0400 Insomnia's toll on the heart: study highlights cardiovascular event risks
COVID-19 大流行如何影响英国中学生的心理健康研究人员评估了 COVID-19 对英国中学生心理健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/How-the-COVID-19-pandemic-affected-mental-well-being-of-UK-secondary-school-students.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/How-the-COVID-19-pandemic-affected-mental-well-being-of-UK-secondary-school-students.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d891c8be-c36e-4e67-91e3-1e990ebb97b4 Tue, 26 Sep 2023 05:41:00 -0400 How the COVID-19 pandemic affected mental well-being of UK secondary school students
长期的新冠疫情如何影响儿童和青少年的学校经历？长期新冠疫情对学校经历的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/How-does-long-covid-impact-the-school-experiences-of-children-and-young-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/How-does-long-covid-impact-the-school-experiences-of-children-and-young-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8726d1c-4390-4bd3-be87-065387e12752 Tue, 26 Sep 2023 05:39:00 -0400 How does long covid impact the school experiences of children and young people?
敲响健康警钟：伦敦河流数据凸显环境危险对伦敦水道中新出现的化学品/污染物 (CEC) 进行有史以来最大规模的时空监测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/One-health-wake-up-call-Londons-river-data-highlights-environmental-perils.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/One-health-wake-up-call-Londons-river-data-highlights-environmental-perils.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=632cafdb-94b7-4877-af71-2a286066093e Tue, 26 Sep 2023 05:11:00 -0400 One health wake-up call: London's river data highlights environmental perils
新研究显示猴痘模仿天花疫苗的免疫反应《自然通讯》杂志上的研究表明，MPOX 感染会引发类似于天花疫苗接种的抗病毒抗体反应。利用一系列全面的 ELISA，科学家发现检测 MPOX 和天花抗体具有高水平的特异性和灵敏度，为测量免疫反应提供了一种新的、准确的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Monkeypox-mimics-smallpox-vaccines-immune-response-new-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Monkeypox-mimics-smallpox-vaccines-immune-response-new-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef5aa4ae-3b04-45f8-a752-dd2d6cfe2d7d Tue, 26 Sep 2023 00:26:00 -0400 Monkeypox mimics smallpox vaccine's immune response, new study reveals
研究显示，住院的 COVID-19 患者面临三倍多器官损伤的风险英国研究人员发现，通过多器官 MRI 扫描发现，因 COVID-19 住院的患者面临较高的多器官异常中期风险。该研究强调了全面的住院后护理的紧迫性，因为这些异常与持续的精神和身体健康损伤有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Hospitalized-COVID-19-患者-face-triple-the-risk-of-multiorgan-damage-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Hospitalized-COVID-19-患者-face-triple-the-risk-of-multiorgan-damage-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09beb375-b389-4022-8dc5-62c462ce3e76 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 23:47:00 -0400 Hospitalized COVID-19 patients face triple the risk of multiorgan damage, study reveals
深度学习彻底改变了超低场脑部 MRI，实现更快、更清晰的扫描研究人员开发了一种深度学习框架来加速超低场脑部 MRI，实现更快的扫描时间并提高图像质量。该方法有望使 MRI 更易于使用和可靠，特别是在高场扫描仪访问受限的环境中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Deep-learning-revolutionizes-ultra-low-field-brain-MRI-for-quicker-clearer-scans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Deep-learning-revolutionizes-ultra-low-field-brain-MRI-for-quicker-clearer-scans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91c8e722-bfcc-4d4a-b3c6-543ac32aeb88 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 23:32:00 -0400 Deep learning revolutionizes ultra-low-field brain MRI for quicker, clearer scans
研究发现肺部衰老巨噬细胞促进肿瘤生长巨噬细胞是一种白细胞，是人体抵御感染的第一道防线。除了杀死有害微生物外，巨噬细胞通常还可以发起针对肿瘤的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Senescent-macrophages-in-the-lung-promote-tumor-growth-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Senescent-macrophages-in-the-lung-promote-tumor-growth-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7cf25edf-1c29-4a94-8634-7f7318b5a0df Mon, 25 Sep 2023 23:24:00 -0400 Senescent macrophages in the lung promote tumor growth, study finds
研究发现干细胞移植为多发性硬化症患者带来希望自体造血干细胞移植（简称aHSCT）通常用于治疗血癌，涉及从患者自身的骨髓或血液中采集干细胞，然后进行化疗和抗体治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Stem-cell-transplant-offers-hope-for-MS-病人-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Stem-cell-transplant-offers-hope-for-MS-患者-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad24e63a-9737-429b-9079-1eecfdd0f56b Mon, 25 Sep 2023 23:00:51 -0400 Stem cell transplant offers hope for MS patients, study finds
专家表示，长期的新冠病毒研究受到方法缺陷的困扰研究人员表示，在研究该疾病的发病率、患病率和控制情况（流行病学）时，定义过于宽泛、缺乏适当的或任何比较组等都扭曲了风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Long-COVID-research-plagued-by-flawed-methods-say-experts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Long-COVID-research-plagued-by-flawed-methods-say-experts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=900c7d4d-b474-46e8-af32-56f93ff41481 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 22:50:20 -0400 Long COVID research plagued by flawed methods, say experts
